title: Password Generator
description: Password Generator is one of my first apps. The App prompts the user for input variables like; password length, upper and lower case letters, and special characters.

title: Work Day Scheduler
description: Work Day Scheduler is the 5th app I have built, it is a simple app that records what you input in the time fields. The time fields change color with the current time. The input is saved in local storage.

title: CityScoop
description: CityScoop is my first collaborative development project. Our 5 developer team invented an app that allows a user to research information on any city, using only our app with no external links.

title: PODS
description: PODS is my second collaborative development project. Our 4 developer team engineered an app that creates a community of support for school-from-home children and their parents during the pandemic.

title: Minnisvart
description: Minnisvart is an app that connects users to local mini-adventures. It is a collaborative development project built by a team of five. This app has two repos; Front End and Back End, connected through CORS.

title: Progressive Budget
description: This app is an exercise in Mongo database and PWA - adding offline useability to an app. I have created a simple budget tracker using express and mongoose with an MVC framework.
